summary: A comprehensive suite of unit tests covering the core functionalities of the RAG evaluation library, including analytics tracking, asynchronous execution, cost and token calculations, dataset and testset schemas, metric computations, prompt handling, configuration reproducibility, import validation, utility helpers, and overall package integrity.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness, stability, and performance of the RAG evaluation components by automatically detecting regressions and ensuring that each module behaves as expected under various scenarios.
